about_the_game:
Backrooms New Gate is an intense horror-adventure in early access that immerses you in a world of mysterious corridors, enigmatic rooms, and deadly traps. You’ll face eerie entities, challenging puzzles, and tension that won’t let go until the very end.

DANGEROUS AND UNIQUE LEVELS

Explore unique levels, each filled with puzzles or dangers. From the typical yellow rooms of the Backrooms to dark labyrinths, every location hides its own secrets and traps. You never know what awaits around the corner: an exit or a new trap.

TRAPS AND ENTITIES

Not every corner is safe. Once caught in a trap, be prepared for mysterious entities to begin pursuing you. Run, hide, and use your wits to survive in these sinister spaces.

PUZZLES AND SECRETS

Backrooms New Gate is not only about horror but also a test of your mind. Solve intricate puzzles to unlock new paths and progress through the levels. Search for notes, audio recordings, and video logs left by researchers to uncover what happened in these strange places.

PSYCHOLOGICAL TENSION

The game keeps you on edge: flickering lights, strange sounds, footsteps in the dark, and unexpected events - all create an atmosphere where reality feels unstable. In this game, your fear is your greatest enemy.

INTERACTIVE WORLD

Interact with the environment: find objects, study notes, activate devices, and discover paths to freedom. You never know what might be hiding behind the next door - salvation or yet another trap.

CONSTANT SENSE OF DANGER

Every level is full of hidden threats. Traps, monsters, puzzles, and dangers await at every turn. Only the most cautious and observant players will find a way out of this nightmare.

SECRETS OF THE PAST

Follow the traces of those who came before you. The notes, audio recordings, and video diaries you find will help piece together the story and uncover what happened to the researchers who once tried to unravel the mysteries of this strange place. But will they help you escape?

Backrooms New Gate offers players a unique survival experience in dangerous and mysterious corridors, where every step could be your last. Explore, survive, and uncover the secrets of the Backrooms!

name: Backrooms: New Gate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 SUPER VENTUS XS OC
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Backrooms New Gate is an indie horror-adventure game created by a solo developer. Explore the endless corridors and rooms of the Backrooms, uncover eerie secrets, avoid deadly traps and entities. Solve puzzles to find your way forward, but be careful - danger may lurk around every corner.
